group_1.narration: Then I met Shizuka, Chiharu, and Sunao at Suitoku Temple.
They're all descended from the Tokime bloodline,@and part of my generation of Diviners.
The first thing I did was ask ‘em@what Kamihama's "secret" was.
What the hell was that Witch-lookin' thing@that spoiled brat brought out?

group_1.textLeft: Are you saying…@Magical Girls end up turning into Witches?
That's just unbelievable…

group_1.textRight: …But it is true.
We have come to Kamihama
in search of a way to change that fate.

group_1.narration: …Some time later, I decided to start livin' in Kamihama
in order to explore the city's "secret".

group_1.textCenter: Ta-daaaah! Check out my new uniform!

group_1.textRight: You started going to your new school today,@didn't you?
That's great! You're going to Minaminagi Liberty@Academy now…right?

group_1.textLeft: Yup, today was my first day.@I was pretty dang nervous!
But it's a real great place!

group_1.textRight: So you get anxious, too.
Why'd you have to change schools, anyway?
I was wondering the same…
If you live here, it's an awfully long commute to Kamihama…

group_1.textLeft: Well, it's still a 40-minute train ride either way.
I'd rather live here in case of emergencies.

group_1.textRight: This just goes to show how serious she is@about helping us.
We should welcome her with open arms.
Yeah!
Before we go further…@I hope you enjoy your new school.

group_1.textLeft: You bet I will!
Oh, right! I already made buddies with some other Magical Girls at school!

group_1.textRight: Really? I suppose there are a lot of Magical Girls@out there.
Whaaat?! Who are they?!

group_1.textLeft: Lemme think…@Today I met…

group_1.narration: Sakurako, a girl in my class, and…
Ryou, a junior from the newspaper club…
and Hinano, an upperclassman in the chemistry club.

group_1.textLeft: So three people!
Ah, but I guess Sakurako ain't exactly a Magical Girl.
They're all some real good fellas, though!

group_1.textRight: Three people…@I wonder if they're associates of Ms. Tamaki's…?

group_1.textLeft: Ms. Tamaki?

group_1.textRight: She's a Magical Girl from Kamihama who saved us@the other day.
Whatever their reasoning, just like us…
She and her allies seem to be trying to figure out@a way to avoid becoming Devils.

group_1.textLeft: They call it the Automatic Purification System.

group_1.textRight: They said their goal is to spread that system@all around the world!

group_1.textLeft: The world… That's a damn huge scale.
I heard a little about this earlier, but…
The Tokime are tryin' to piggyback off the system,@right?

group_1.textRight: Piggyback…? I'm not sure if that's the right word…
We would really like to have a piece of it, however.
And to do that, we'll require a certain power.

group_1.textLeft: And the thing that gives you that power is…?

group_1.textRight: Here!
This magical bracelet that won't come off of my arm!

group_1.textLeft: That bracelet, eh～?@Ya sure?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, positive!@Because…
The great Kyūbē told us so!

group_1.textLeft: (The great Kyūbē…huh…)
